website_summaries.verdict: A daily nutritional supplement that can support joint and hip health over the long-term.
pros: Cats seem to like this chew
Many older animals seem to have an easier time moving around after starting these supplements
Can help improve the quality of life for your aging feline
cons: These chews are supposed to be soft, but sometimes come hardened

customer_reviews.title: People version $6 (150 count) -- Dog version $30-$40 (120 count)?!
customer_reviews.text: Believe that these have been replaced by the next greatest thing to ever happen for joint pain relief and prevention in dogs, G4 ($40). That being said G3 ($30) has the ingredient that we were looking for, Glucosamine. It is hard to know if these are doing any good for our dog. He just had surgery on his elbow and it appears that he will always walk with a limp. These pills may be a good idea and the dog will eat them no problem; however, they are expensive and just come in a bag with a twisty.
customer_reviews.author: KeoghTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8yr old Blue Heeler who has problems with stiff joints at the end of the day especially when she plays hard and runs a lot. As long as I give her one of these DVM Soft Chews, she is like a puppy again. I know she feels much better and isn't stiff at the end of the day which is the best part! A bonus is that she loves the flavor. Our vet recommended these and they really do work. I HIGHLY Recommend for your older active pup!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Massey

customer_reviews.title: Product reformulated; now my dogs won't eat it!
customer_reviews.text: Have relied on this stuff for YEARS to keep my aging dogs moving. I could really tell the difference after starting them on this years ago, when the item came in the white bin. When I needed to reorder, I noticed the packaging had changed, but was also a Bayer product and the active and inactive ingredient list was exactly the same! And YET! My dogs will not eat these new chews. Doesn't matter if I mix them into their favorite food or not; they simply walk away from the entire bowl of food. So, not sure what Bayer did in addition to changing the packaging but....sad I have to find a new one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tillson

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving these to my dog for the last several years. He apparently likes the flavor because he readily eats it. There seems to be a change in the formula. Before they were smooth, a bit more chewy and a bit greasy. Now they are a bit gritty or maybe some kind of crumbs have been added because they are no longer oily which in my book is a plus and they crumble easily. My dog still likes them and it helps with his arthritis and that's all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: Babycakes

customer_reviews.title: Called Bayer, yup manufacturing process has changed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a bag of these and I've been using them for years. They were dried out and my dogs won't eat them, like saw dust. Ordered a bag from another supplier, same thing, dried out. What the heck! I called Bayer directly. Guess what folks it's not you imagination. Bayer changed the manufacturing process but I was told "oh don't worry, they're made and fortified with the same ingredients". Great, feed them to your dog! I called the vet, the suggested Dasuquin. Amazon carries these, maybe I'll try them?
customer_reviews.author: LSofSacto

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, recommended by my vet years ago
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, recommended by my vet years ago. My old timer (12-1/2) has been on Synovi G3 for 5 or 6 years now. She is nimble & spry... the one time I ran out I had to apologize to her. Without it, she is stiff & sore. First week give 2 a day and thereafter one a day. I just throw it in with her breakfast now. When I had 2 on it, they would perform a trick and accept it as a treat. :)
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: The product was dried out
customer_reviews.text: Normally these 'chews' are very soft and fresh. The order I received was very dry and crumbly. My dog still ate them, but they were not the quality I had purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs were on a different supplement until about a week ago. Even tho we thot the other supplement was doing a good job, we can already tell a difference with these chews. We've never had a male German Shepherd live 10 years - our male just had his 10th birthday. He seems to be doing great with his arthritis, and both dogs like the chews!
customer_reviews.author: Suwanneelady9

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Always Fresh
customer_reviews.text: The price for these chews is so much lower than at my veterinarian's office. They are always "fresh" and moist. I do actually spray a little more water inside the package and seal it all back up to make the chews softer. It helps me hide my dog's medicine inside them. These chews are stinky and it's recommended that one wash their hands after handling. But my dog loves them and the ability to make them softer to hide her pills saves me from buying pill pockets. My dog's joints seems to be better since taking these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stiff joints
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended for my 11 year old pup. Her joints are stiff and she sometimes has trouble moving around. The chews have really helped her; she is more active and moves with ease (or as swift as a dog her age). Would definitely recommend to other pet owners. My dog loves these as well - I put in her food bowl, and she moves her food out of the way to eat her Synovi chew first.
customer_reviews.author: EMILY F

customer_reviews.title: Continues to be good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for many years. (From way before Bayer bought them). Quality seems to have carried through the transition. Have had past issues with dry product but not since Bayer took over. This product has improved the lives of several older dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P. Essebaggers

customer_reviews.title: Great chews!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these chews. They offer joint support, especially to my American Staff Terrier who blew out both her knee joints years ago & had to wear leg braces for 3 months, has been taking these glucosamine chondroitin chews once a day ever since. At 11 years old, she still has spring in her legs as if she were a young pup! My other dog, also 11 years old is able to climb 2 flights of stairs with no problem. They get 1 chew a day based on their weight for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Milano

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs. The older of the two has lately started to not get up as well. It takes him a while to get moving. I accidentally ordered the big dog formula. I should have ordered the small dog ones but I have to say they are working great. Since they are soft my little dogs can still eat them. Seems like my dog is getting up easier and has more energy. I would reccomend this for someone that is concerned about their pet getting older. Since we do not feed our dogs a senior food these chews give them all of the nutrients they need to continue their active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These are the best solution for older dogs with joint problems
customer_reviews.text: These are the best solution for older dogs with joint problems. My dog used to worry at his front wrists, but after a few days on these stopped.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Stale, Dry, & Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for years. My recent order was not soft and moist like they normally are, but rather crumbly, lighter in color, and very dry. My dog wouldn’t touch them (and she normally loves them).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog is Happy and I Am Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this product for my beloved dog. He had slowed up somewhat with age with joint discomfort. After a few weeks on the Bayer Animal Health DVM Synovi G3 Soft Chews, our sweet boy is moving easier and he loves the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for dogs with stiff joints and arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend to help alleviate some pain for my 11 year old dog with arthritis. I've been giving these to her for a little over a year now and it works great. She isn't nearly as stiff getting up and moving around as she has been. When the weather gets colder and her arthritis gets worse, I give it to her twice a day until she starts feeling better, otherwise I follow the dosage on the packaging. Buying this product through Amazon is much cheaper than other pet stores. I highly recommend this product for dogs with stiff joints and arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: EMILY F

customer_reviews.title: This product isn't this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Synovi G3--but this ain't it! Twice I've ordered the Synovi G3, [which my blind Dalmatian loved (because of its moist chewiness) and thrived on]. And twice I received a container of pellets harder than hail. The container (from two different lots) is stamped as though it were "fresh": but I've handled fresh, and this ain't it. Buy this only from the original source, or beware. Forewarned is forearmed, and when it comes to the health of your beloved pet, my best suggestion is "caution."
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as 240 chews, but it is 120!
customer_reviews.text: The product is advertised as 240 chews in the main product line. This is why I purchased the products because of the quantity. It is different from the description at the bottom of the page showing in the detail 120. Disappointed in being mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Beissner

customer_reviews.title: This is best buy that I have found for this product
customer_reviews.text: This is best buy that I have found for this product. I feel they work fantastic for dogs. My Newfoundland took these every day sense we got her at 8 weeks old. She lived to 11.5 years and had a lot of arthritis, but still had the ability to jump on the bed which she was not supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Tina

customer_reviews.title: Three dogs none will eat it
customer_reviews.text: Our vet told us our standard poodle needed this because he is 12 and that it would help his joints. He gave us a product called sonovial chews. I thought the sonovial G3 would be the same thing. He ate the regular sonovial but would not touch the sonovial G3. We tried our other two dogs none of our dogs would touch it. I called the manufacture they said send it back and they sent a free shipping label. That was sent on February 9th and I have not heard a word from them. I spent 67.00 dollars and I am still waiting for a refund. If I don't hear from them in 2 more weeks I will contact paypal.
customer_reviews.author: Terterific

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my vet, works great
customer_reviews.text: I started giving these to my 10 year old dog per my vets recommendation. He is still very active and likes to play but we noticed he was having a harder time recovering after a hard playing weekend. These have really helped, friends have commented they see more pep in his step. He's now 11 and still loves them, thinks they are a treat.
customer_reviews.author: ljm

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Senior Lab w/his Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference in my 10 year old Lab/Pit mix when he doesn't take it. He takes 2 everyday (he's 76lbs) and he still likes the taste after 6 months. He thinks they are treats.
customer_reviews.author: Qualified Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all our senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: How do use this product for years. The price is good and I see measurable improvement in my senior dogs' activity and comfort level after starting on this. All three that I currently give it to are happy to eat it in their food. If I do not seal the bag, they do get stale but the dogs don't seem to mind. If I seal the bag, they keep just fine for the 96 days it takes me to go through a tub.
customer_reviews.author: SpringLake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff- but discontinued???
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! My lab started showing improved movement and less stiffness within a week or two. However, my dogs won't take them as treats as some of the reviewers wrote. They hate the taste, so I tried peanut butter, but they figured that out pretty quickly. Liverwurst sometimes works, but now I just crumble it in their food and they'll eat it. Unfortunately, though, I received a notice with my last shipment that this product is being discontinued. The seller recommends Joint Max, but I know nothing about this. It seems to get good ratings, too, but I'm wondering what happened to make DVM take this off the market!!!
customer_reviews.author: jmcc33

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old GSD no longer limping on long walks.
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this as my 10 year old GSD began to limp on long walks. Since I began giving this product to her twice a day at each feeding, the limp is gone. Beware of some of the other products, they appear cheaper, but you have to give two nuggets per feeding or 4 per day. Effectively, this doubles their price to you.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Not same product as before
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product as pictured or that I used to get. The product that I received (twice now) is in a different packaging, and does not look/feel the same. The product I used to get was moist and chewy. The last two time, I've the product I've received is dry and smells funky. Read other reviews- apparently, the company was bought by Bayer and the quality went to s**t. I'm disappointed I have been feeding these to my dog the past few months. Instead of making the same mistake, I purchased Butler Schein S3's recommended by my vet.
customer_reviews.author: memes_33

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for Preventative Care!!! *Great for Cold Climates*
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome supplement for preventative care for large and small dogs! My parents have a King Doberman/Shepard Mix (80lbs) who was born with Hip Dysplasia (spell check) and instead of putting him down their Veternarian prescribed this supplement. 13 yrs later he has lived a normal life with absolutely no pain. My own dog (Rotty / Retriever Mix) is now 14 1/2 yrs old and has been on Synova G3 since he was 7. We get compliments all the time for his agility and actually looks like he's only 4 yrs old! Love this supplement -- but purchase it through Amazon.com. It's almost double in cost (120 ct) if you buy it through your vet!!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoBean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mastiff that has had joint problems and isn't even a year old. We cannot afford surgery and were recommended to try joint supplements. These supplements are amazing!!! We noticed a difference after only a couple of days using the recommended loading dose in our dog's activity. He no longer limps or whines when moving around or playing with our other dogs. He has been more energetic and playful as well. Who knew a joint supplement could work so well?!?! They must have a tasty flavor because our dogs absolutely love them and sit for them wagging their tails like a treat. Completely recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Schmarah5

customer_reviews.title: not the same chews
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this for years. My picky dogs act like this is "doggy-crack." The chews are usually soft and moist. I can usually break one in half, put in a pill of medication, and squeeze it together. But this last shipment, although my dogs still eat 'em up, they were very dry and hard. No putting pills into these. not sure if DVM changed the recipe or we just got a bad lot.
customer_reviews.author: Short One

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog had knee surgery for patella luxation and after complications and him refusing to use that leg post surgery the doctor suggested trying glyclosimine which acts as a rebuilder of cartilage and lubricates the joint. Within a week of using this product my dog resumed using his injured leg. The doctor pointed out that there is no placebo affect with dogs - he doesn't know he's getting medicine. In addition the dog loves these, I give it like a treat. It's his "little brownies" and he can't wait to get one a day.
customer_reviews.author: N1CKV

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with freshness
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Synovi G3 'soft' chews today 5/23/12...If I hadn't used Synovi G3 before I would have thought very poorly of the product. The 'soft' chews were old, stale, crumbly and discolored. I figure this is a fault of the supplier, DVM Resources. I am very disappointed in the quality of the product I received. I am uncertain if the proper benefit of this usually good product will be achieved. I will never order this product from this supplier again. Sharon C Johnson Belmont, CA
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They help and my dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I have no bad words to describe them. My dog will drop her milk bones and eat them first.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for prevention
customer_reviews.text: Use for supplemental preventive reasons. The last batch I received was dryer than normal but not crumbly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your pup's joints
customer_reviews.text: Review from the wife: I have been using this for years for my labs and my Great Pyrenees. They love the taste and look forward to their "medicine" every day! I used to buy these from my vet...whom I love and respect greatly. But Amazon had them for HALF the price! I love to buy local, but this is a huge savings! When my old dog get a little gimpy when the weather turns cold, I up her dosage with an extra chew. I swear, in one day she is no longer limping. She just needed a little extra lube in her joints!
customer_reviews.author: G and E

customer_reviews.title: Synovi G3
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST AMAZING joint medicine for dogs. I have a boxer/sheperd mix who has a huge bone spur in her right hip and dysplesia as well. This medicine keeps her running,as well getting up and down with no pain. My friend who has a pit bull who is now 10 years old and was groaning everytime he stood up tried it. He is no longer in any pain. This stuff is miraculous - beyond what words can describe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee Drake

customer_reviews.title: Could be Better!
customer_reviews.text: The Chews were old & dried out! Dogs NOT to thrilled about them either!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Night and day difference
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog and he was really starting to show signs of slowing down until we started these once/day, per our vet's recommendation. It made a huge difference in his energy and recovery. You can tell when he doesn't take them for a couple days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: ljm

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin gummies
customer_reviews.text: My furry kids seem to enjoy the taste. Max (boxer) 🥰loves it, Prince (poodle) I add peanut butter, MacCoy (mini Golden) also with peanut butter. But once they try one they want to repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Punki

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Supplement!!
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended these when I brought my 8 year old labradoodle in with pretty bad hip problems. She was in a lot of pain and had trouble walking. I started giving her these every day and within a month she was like a puppy again! She has been on them now for about 2 years and has not taken one lame step since! They are a miracle! I've put my other younger dogs on it as well as a preventative. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Synovi G3 Soft Chews
customer_reviews.text: Love these! This is one of two supplements I have been giving our aging yellow lab (12 in May) for several years, when her vet first recommended glucosamine. It really does seem to slow the progression of her arthritis. She was noticeably worse years ago before we started her on anything. I would also recommend Glyco-Flex III, as equally effective. (The MSM + Perna formulas seem to be the most effective for her.) When we run out, I buy whichever is cheaper. Also, I have had only good experiences with this particular seller so far (Entirely Pets).
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs has a problem with hip joint and tendon. The Vet said to give the Soft Chews for the rest of her life. It might help, it might not, the jury is still out. We purchased these because they are the same product but much less expensive than at the Vet's office. The dogs get 2 a day and since they are young, we will save a lot of money over the years by buying here. We have one dog that likes them and one that must be teased into eating them. Perhaps a different flavor would be helpful for those picky eaters? Regardless, they will get them forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The greatest dog ever
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my elderly dog every day from ages 14-18. Yes, she lived to 18 and she wasn't tiny. She was 30 lbs. The greatest dog ever. Anyway, I would like to think that these helped her stay mobile. Just a week before she passed, she would still run at the park. Not a lot but seriously she was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs hated it and the stuff looked nasty so I do ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hated it and the stuff looked nasty so I do not blame them at all. I would trick them into eating it and never noticed any differance in my dogs hips etc. I eventually tossed it in the garbage. Went to using the Cosequin® DS Plus MSM Joint Health Supplement pills and my dogs think they are treats and eat with no problem and in 2 months time my dogs are like new dogs and running and jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Around
customer_reviews.text: The first batch - Sammy George Michael (the dog) LOVED - they sort-of, kind-of smelled like bacon - the second batch - not so much so I smeared them with peanut butter - and he ate them I'm hoping the third batch, are more like the first - BUT, regardless of what they smell like , or if I have to smear them with peanut butter- I do believe that they helped Sammy George Michael with his joint pain - after all he is 12 years old - and gets a little stiff -
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Synovi G3
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest English Bulldog has had hip problems since we got her from rescue. Out vet had recommended these for her years ago and she likes the taste and they helped alleviate her staggering movements. The cost at the vet for the product kept creeping up higher and higher; so I was delighted to find these on line at half the price for twice the amount I pay at the vet's. You have saved the life of our Princess and given her affordable relief again. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUPPLEMENT
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old min pin has been having a hard time getting up and was limping terribly after arising.Thanks to all the great reviews on this product i purchased these chews.Well my dog loves them and after only 1 week of taking these chews there is a noticable improvement in her condition.She is once again jumping up and down off the sofas and beds just like she used to do when she was younger.I anticipate that as time goes by these chews will only help her even more.They smell like beef boullion cubes and she goes nuts for them......try it.
customer_reviews.author: JennyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Synovi G3 works!
customer_reviews.text: To ease my two 10-year-old german shepherds' arthritis, I have tried a number of products to no avail. Some of the products were glucosamine only and some were combinations of glucosamine and chondroitin, but this is the first product where I can tell a difference. They've only been on it for about 3 or 4 weeks, so I'm hopeful they will continue to improve. They are climbing the stairs and moving around much better than before. I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Helps our dogs back
customer_reviews.text: Our little 16 yr old dog has back problems and these seem to help him move a easier. He doesn't love or hate the way they taste but we mix part of one into his food and he eats it. He is a super picky eater so this is actually good.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago my 12 year old lab had a clicking sound starting in her hip (arthtitis). My vet suggested Synovi G3 Chews. After 6 weeks on the chews Rainey's hip quit clicking and her sister seems to get around easier as well. They are both now 14 years old and get their chews each morning. It's great when you can actually see a difference when you feed your pets supplements. I did my research before purchasing the chews and can say i'm 100% satisfied and am quite sure the girls would not be doing as well without them.
customer_reviews.author: Trixi T

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My two golden retrievers love to get these every morning as a treat. It really helps them because they are 96 lbs and 7 years old. They move around a lot easier when they take these.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My great dane/black lab mix was suffering from arthritis in his front paw and the vet recommended SynoviG3 which they sell at their clinic. Within the initial six weeks they recommend to start, his limp was gone. I ordered this large container to help save money versus the vet's price. I highly recommend this product to anyone with an aging dog. Mine hasn't limped at all since starting to use this product and he is nine years old!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: but she was limping before with her back leg joint (she has bad knees). Within days
customer_reviews.text: I kind of noticed a difference in my Pomeranian within one week...that might be too soon...maybe I was just imagining, but she was limping before with her back leg joint (she has bad knees). Within days, she was running around and didn't seem to be having any pain. Might just be a coincidence, but if it was because of the DVM, then this stuff is a miracle! :-)
customer_reviews.author: florida-mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my older hunting dog.
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this brand. After a month of giving them to my dog, she seems to have less stiffness and pain in her hips after a long day of hunting. Highly recommended especially for slightly older working/hunting dogs.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: ... been purchasing this for our golden retriever that has bad hips. Poor guy was in loads of pain
customer_reviews.text: Have been purchasing this for our golden retriever that has bad hips. Poor guy was in loads of pain, limping and refusing to go up stairs. Vet suggested trying these first before surgery and pain medication. Bought this brand based on reviews and it worked like a miracle for him. No more limping, he is back to his old self, jumping and playful. Although its quite pricey, its worth trying if you have a pet with joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: kmccor0723

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Joint Relief, Apparently
customer_reviews.text: Couple of small/medium dogs, didn't want to jump up on bed anymore at ages 10-12 years. After a few days of these "treats" they are back to nearly normal. They are still old, but they are willing to jump, rather than wait to be lifted. Our vet recommended this, and he was right. I only wish it were even cheaper, but the large supply is acceptably priced. By the way, both dogs eagerly await the chews each day.
customer_reviews.author: Karl F. Arps

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these chewables as opposed to the granules that the vet's office sold us to put over our dog's food. These work so much better and are much more cost effective than the vet's office!! The dog eats them as if they were a treat, and we know that she's actually getting all of the benefit of the Synovi since there isn't any question as to whether she's actually eating all of it or not and it's not in the crevaces of her food bowl like the granules did. We've been buying these for over a year now and are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Smile4532

customer_reviews.title: Put the spring back in her step!
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 1/2yr old Mastiff was getting very stiff and had trouble getting up or coming up the 3 stairs to the house. She no longer played with the other dogs...which she previously LOVED to do. We ordered the G3 and by the time we moved to the maintenance dose she was not having any problems getting up, didn't hesitate going up the stairs and was back to playing with the younger dogs. She has not been on it that long so we look for added improvements as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement for my dogs health
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old, male boxer who suffers with arthritis in his hind legs and knee joints. It had gotten so bad that he was often barely able to walk. I started him out on 2 tablets, 2 times a day. Within ten days I saw a huge improvement. He's able to walk, jump on and off of furniture and even play at the beach. I will continue to give this to him and am very grateful for what this product has done for the life he has remaining!
customer_reviews.author: JudyH

customer_reviews.title: bought it for my fussy dog who does not eat ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my fussy dog who does not eat well...it may be just her but she's not crazy about the taste so I have a hard time getting her to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley H

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a mini-dachsund
customer_reviews.text: My mini-dachshund is on his second container of this supplement. I have experimented taking him off the chews, but his quality of life decreased dramatically, so I quickly put him back on the supplement and it perked him back up in days. While the supplement is not cheap, watching my dachshund run around likes he is 2 years old again is well worth it. I use this in combination with Rimidyl to manage his arthritis and disc issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: SynoviG3
customer_reviews.text: My dog has arthritis and bad knees so this was recommended by my Vet. The vet sells the product but, of course, due to storage in their facility etc, the cost is far more. The product works for my pup and she gets around quite well...it must taste like a treat to her as she is always anxious to get her chews in the morning! The cost on Amazon is quite a savings from that of my vet.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT product, GREAT value
customer_reviews.text: First recommended by Our veterinarian, My 2 Springer's are continuously BENEFITING from this EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Will Wright

customer_reviews.title: Tasty even for the finicky dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that won't eat any of the supposed chewable medicine, so we were hesitant to try another chewable. She loves these and even bets for them if we forget giving them to her with her morning feeding.
customer_reviews.author: flgirl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 year old lab/shepherd mix who seems to be getting up more slowly all the time. I bought these at the recommendation of my sister-in-law who gives them to her two labs who have hip dysplasia. I've heard that glucosamine doesn't really do anything, but it make me feel better to give them to her just in case they really do work. I can't say I see her leaping out of her bed, but she does leap into the air to gulp it when I toss it to her - she loves them. It also seems that she isn't getting up as gingerly as before.
customer_reviews.author: Marina's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product, DMV Resources SynoviG3 Soft Chews, should be somewhat moist if it is fresh. This product was hard and dry as a bone. The first tub I purchased from Amazon was fresh as were all the ones I purchased from my vet's office. Apparently the quality control at Amazon is lax. I would not recommend that you spend this amount of money for a product that is supposed to help your dog's joints unless it is from some place with a good reputation for quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Lily

customer_reviews.title: Old Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with purchasing this product trough Amazon in the past, and the product has worked well with my dog. However, this time, rather than receiving one 240 ct bucket, I received 2 120ct buckets when ordered. The first bucket I opened, the chews are almost like dust rather than soft and moist. I can find no expiration date. I would guess were dumping old product. I doubt I will use them again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs LOVE these "Scooby Snacks", and they have helped w/ hip trouble
customer_reviews.text: Both of our dogs LOVE these soft chews, and look forward to what we've dubbed their "scooby snacks" every single day :) One of our dog is an aging lab mix who has recently presented with hip trouble, and we noticed that the spring in his step returned after about 2 weeks of daily Synovi G3 "treats".
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: JUST TRY IT !
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product on my Australian Shepherds and it is a great product. They are both 14 years old. The one elderly girl has back issues and this really helps. Try it for two months and you will see a difference. I first bought this from my vet but too pricey there.
customer_reviews.author: JustDi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for older dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years for all my older Pugs. I start giving around 9 years old or sooner if they show joint discomfort. Recommend by my personal vet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for my dog for quite a while now. I must admit, I was a skeptic at first, but now I'm a believer. He has arthritis in both of his front legs, and was limping more often than not. He limps a lot less now, and when he does, it is for a much shorter period of time. I didn't like giving him Rimadyl all the time, and now I don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P

customer_reviews.title: the greyhounds love it
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 greyhounds - retired racers - one that is going on 13 and has a few issues with his joints. The vet reccommended SynoviG3 by name, and also gave us some pain meds for him. We've been giving it to all 3 for about 6 months now and see a marked improvement in the movement of our oldest - he's more energetic and ready to roll at a moments notice. He's been off the pain meds totally after the first 2 weeks of treatment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been taking SynoviG3 for years, which has made a big improvement in the quality of life for my older arthritic dog. He no longer takes pain meds for his arthritis which is amazing. 2 chews a day, which must be very tasty(they smell good too)because they gobble them up like a special treat. The price is better than any local store and a bit better than what our vet charges. They were promptly delivered also.
customer_reviews.author: JP-Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and trustworthy brand
customer_reviews.text: We have used Synovi products, first suggested to us by our veterinarian, for close to 15 years for our various dogs who have needed a supplement due to aging and/or surgery on their joints. Synovi works. There is an incredible improvement in our pets comfort level and mobility, and it has lessened or eliminated the need for pain killers. We swear by the Synovi brand and particularly like the convenience of the Soft Chews.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old lab mix is playful again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 tubs of these chews after reading an article written by a vet in Placerville, California. My 13 year old lab mix could hardly get off his pillow because of arthritic hips and lack of strength. He takes pain medication for that and special diet but nothing worked to change his condition. After only 2 weeks on the Synovi G3 Soft Chews (just 2 chews a day). He is back to playing with toys, going for walks with us and even doing his prance when he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: My furbaby can run and jump again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini poodle who was suffering with arthritis. I started giving her 1/2 a day and within weeks, she was no longer getting out of kennel in morning hopping on 3 legs. She will be 12 this year and runs like a new puppy. Highly recommended to friends and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R.

customer_reviews.title: My Dog is Young at Heart
customer_reviews.text: This has saved a lot of grief for my cockerpoo. She has a luxating patella and this medication has allowed her to live a normal life without incident.
customer_reviews.author: SooZ

customer_reviews.title: !!! DANGEROUS !!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever has been eating Synovi G3 for 8 years. All good, she loved it. But after eating from this batch, she have for fewer, was shaking and in big pain!!! She could barely walk!!! She felt really bad the whole day, we were thinking to bring her to the pets emergency room, but in the evening, we saw a progress to getting better. The second day, she was still recovering and third day, she was OK again. We are returning the product and we have to try to find some other source of glocosamine. It is very dangerous product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jiri Stybnar

customer_reviews.title: Anthing for Sasha
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years now as it provides pain relief through the glucosamine for my 11 year old Siberian Husky. I noticed her limp some when getting up off the floor and started her on Synovi G# Chews and noticed a difference right away. I crumble upa tablet and mix in her dog food as she started to baulk at taking it alone, it works well
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 teenage Westies on Synovi Chews. I started them on the advise of my vet and it took about a month before I saw the full effects. But it has helped a great deal for their arthritis aches. They are quicker to get up and are playing with the younger dog and just seem to feel so much better. The price I paid on Amazon is a significant savings over the vet.'s price too. My dogs also love the taste. They wait every morning for their "vitamin" and think of them as an extra treat. Definitely worth a try if you have an old arthritic dog.
customer_reviews.author: S. James

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old 95 pound lab has arthritis in her front shoulder. This product has made a significant improvement in her within the 1st month'ish of taking 1 treat twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: I always search for the best product at the best price
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, I feel as if I was "Taken"...I purchased this at a price that was several dollars higher than the "new and improved" version, SynoviG4. When I purchase a product for my dog, I always search for the best product at the best price. I feel as if I have cheated him by buying the "old version" of this product without knowing there was a newer version available...at a lower price. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Ritter

customer_reviews.title: ... has taken these for a over a year with great results.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has taken these for a over a year with great results...... however..... there has been a change to the product "now with poultry-liver flavor". My dog has no allergies to my knowledge but every time I give her one of these now she throws up some time during that day. Just beware that these have changed and may affect your dog differently.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia I.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing supplement for joint maintenance for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Synovi G3 is a miracle supplement for joint maintenance for dogs. The Bayer brand is drier and a bit crumbly vs the DVM brand. But it is just a matter of preference. I can't endorse this product enough for joint care for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Snake Oil?
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had hip and knee issues that have plagued her since she was about 3. Her Vet prescribed an NSAID and MSM. I know that the NSAID eases the pain but the MSM's benefits are intangible. That is the reason for my middle score. Regardless, she won't take the Vet's horse pills w/o a lot of work on my part. These have the prescribed amount of MSM and the dog thinks they are treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: These chews are really effective! Our older border collie ...
customer_reviews.text: These chews are really effective! Our older border collie was limping somewhat from shoulder arthritis and she just seemed old and tired in general, despite quality food and lots of exercise. These basically made her limp go away, and plus she became much more energetic and playful. We also give them to our male who has hip dysplasia as a preventive measure. The only reason they got 4 stars is that the chews used to be very soft and appealing, but changed and are now drier and it's hard to squash pills into them. Still an effective supplement, though!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Helped my 10 Year Old Dog!
customer_reviews.text: He has arthritis and since I have started giving him these every day, I have noticed a difference. I can tell if he misses them so I know they work. 2 a day for a 75lb dog. They work!
customer_reviews.author: Qualified Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed?
customer_reviews.text: This batch is very dry & crumbly. Typically the chews are moist & easy to hide a pill inside
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very effective supplement for joints
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this supplement for my 2 heelers that are are well over 10 years old. After the period where you load them with a double type dose, I could see a major improvement in their mobility. I was able to find better pricing on amazon that at my vet office. And am confident that I am not buying a counterfeit product from an amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for joints
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these exact chews from my vet and I saw that I could order them on Amazon. My dog is old and has arthritis and spine issues. He had been off these chews for a few months and wasn't doing too well. Since being on these, he has improved tremendously. I will continue to buy this product. He thinks they are a snack and I've to watch my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Limon

customer_reviews.title: Soft Chews
customer_reviews.text: If your puppy is now getting older and starting to show his/her age then these could be the best products for them. It helps your pup deal with the arthritic conditions that they have to deal with as they age. My best friend seems to enjoy them and is very mobile since she started chewing them. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Earl

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Improvement
customer_reviews.text: My 45lb Sheltie mix had been limping for a little over two weeks when I took him to the vet who said that at 7 years old it was probably a little arthritis. A friend recommended Synovi G3 about three months ago and after taking just one a day, the limp has substantially reduced and there is no sign of discomfort when we are out walking. It's made a great deal of difference and will stay a part of his daily diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product/good supplier
customer_reviews.text: The Synovi G3 product is the best around for helping with joint health for dogs. The dogs love the meaty chews. Sometimes when the chews arrive, they are hard, but not with this supplier. They are fresh and tender. My dogs love them. I have been feeding the chews to my dogs for over 11 years, starting with them as puppies and swear by them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog had surgery on both knees for torn ACL's when she was just shy of 2 years old. Her surgeon suggested this product, twice daily, for the remainder of her life. She is now going on 6 years old and you would never know that she ever had knee issues in the past. She also loves these so there is no coating pills or trying to get her to take her meds. She just eats these on her own willingly, even waiting at the drawer they are kept in every morning and evening until she gets one.
customer_reviews.author: obi-one

customer_reviews.title: dog supplements
customer_reviews.text: The price was great... almost half of what my vet. charged me originally and the product seems to be working. My 8 year old German Shepherd can't take NSAIDs due to a kidney issue and she hasn't limped since I started adding these "treats" to her daily diet. I ordered the large tub and immeadiately put the extras into zip lock bags to keep them fresh. I will continue to use this product and recommend it to owners with dogs that seem stiff or limp.
customer_reviews.author: RWP

customer_reviews.title: Great for my active labrador.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great for my labrador. I've tried other joint supplements but this is very affordable and my dog loves it. We run at least 18 miles per week and she takes them as suggested by the manufacturer. Anyway, they are work, my dog loves them, and it give you bang for your buck. I highly recommend these joint soft chews. I've posted pictures, too - check them out!
customer_reviews.author: GuapoDad

customer_reviews.title: Great for joint health.
customer_reviews.text: Use every day for our EB. Makes all the difference in his joints.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Renstrom

customer_reviews.title: Last few orders, getting this in two 120 count pails.  Some of the chunks arrive crushed.
customer_reviews.text: The last few times we've bought this, it's been fulfilled as two 120 count containers. Coincidentally, a lot more of the product arrives crushed into granules in the middle, where the bag gets twisted shut, secured with a twist tie, and folded down to lie flat on top. Now, do we break up each chunk into granules when we serve them with meals, but we rely on starting with the chunks for portion control. The product is fine otherwise, we trust it's helping our dogs, but we'd prefer it if the vendor would go back to the 240 count packaging depicted.
customer_reviews.author: Huusi Huudi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Our dog refuses to eat them. A bit expensive to find that out.
customer_reviews.author: cla

customer_reviews.title: Great product just a dried out batch
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for awhile now. This is the second time I have ordered from DVM. 1st time order was order was perfect. This time the chews look dried out, not moist at all. The package was sealed and the expiration date at least a year away. So not sure what happened there. I think this is a great supplement for dogs. I use it for my sheltie who is 9 years old and has some artritis. Seems to help him.
customer_reviews.author: Issabelle

product_meta.title: Bayer Animal Health DVM Synovi G3 Soft Chews
product_meta.description: Size:120 CountNormal wear and tear on joints may affect dogs as young as three years old and it can often go unnoticed. Bayer Synovi G3 Soft Chews is a glucosamine joint supplement for dogs that supports overall joint function and flexibility, and healthy joint cartilage. Formulated with the Synovi Matrix, Synovi G3 contains glucosamine HCl, Green-lipped mussel (a natural source of chondroitin) and omega-3 fatty acids for joint support, creatine monohydrate for muscle tone assistance, and MSM, Vitamin C and Vitamin E for healthy antioxidant performance. Synovi G3 daily soft chew canine joint supplements have been used by veterinarians for over a decade. Bayer is proud to display the National Animal Supplement Council (NASC) Quality Seal, on all of our supplements. The NASC monitors animal health supplements through periodic reviews, inspections and testing. As a pet owner, you can feel confident that every supplement batch is made following procedures to verify that it meets quality control specifications and is labeled with accuracy and consistency.
feature_bullets: COMPREHENSIVE DOG JOINT SUPPLEMENT SOFT CHEW: Synovi G3 helps support joint function and flexibility, and healthy joint cartilage
CONTAINS THE SYNOVI MATRIX: The Synovi G3 matrix is a unique combination of ingredients that assists with joint health, muscle tone and antioxidant function
EASY-TO-GIVE SOFT CHEW: Poultry-flavored soft chew joint supplement is appropriate for dogs of all ages, sizes and breeds
NASC QUALITY SEAL: Bayer has undergone a comprehensive quality audit and earned the National Animal Supplement Council (NASC) Quality Seal

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
